system.description: When you bury someone in messy paperwork by manipulating city officials, roll with HEART.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your machinations are both costly and impotent; a Status-3 NPC takes an interest in your schemes as well as a result of your incompetent meddling.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, you draw unwanted municipal attention to their dealings; they take -1 ongoing to moves during the faction turn until they return to anonymity.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, you draw unwanted municipal attention to their dealings; they take -1 ongoing to moves during the faction turn until they return to anonymity.

On a 10+, you convince your agents at city hall that youâ€™re doing them a favor; take a Debt on them as well.
